channel.title: Software on Superdanby
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Superdanby

item.title: User Experience Enhancements
item.description: All Platforms Atom A beautiful and hackable cross-platform text editor with wonderful Github integration. Fedora Media Writer It has been fixed on Version 4.1.0-1.fc25. On Fedora, the only downside is that the scaling factor in Gnome Tweak Tool has no effect on it. Intel Speed Shift Better power management for Skylake processors and above.
